diff_act: 1.trigger an alert to the control center

regen.absent_element: action of handling the failed request after retrying
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alert to the control center if a status from any device is still not received after retrying the request

label: Failure to receive a valid status after a configurable number of retries shall be considered a device failure.
absence: situation of several number of failed retries
